summary: App with Internet Identity login and admin functionality. Auto-registers the first user who logs in as admin principal.
architectural_notes: First user to log in via Internet Identity is auto-registered as admin principal in the backend.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend admin authentication flow so that when a user logs in via Internet Identity and no admin is yet registered, the app automatically registers that user as admin and grants admin access without showing a 'Permission Denied' error.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the backend to auto-register the first Internet Identity principal that calls a registration or login endpoint as the admin principal. If an admin principal is already set, subsequent logins should not overwrite it.

projectName: Auto-register first login user as admin
